query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS performance_insights (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, campaign_id INT, account_id INT NOT NULL, insight_type ENUM('underperforming', 'overperforming', 'trending', 'negative_sentiment', 'engagement_drop', 'best_time', 'content_suggestion', 'hashtag_recommendation', 'audience_insight') NOT NULL, title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description TEXT NOT NULL, priority ENUM('low', 'medium', 'high', 'critical') DEFAULT 'medium' NOT NULL, recommendations JSON, related_metrics JSON, status ENUM('new', 'viewed', 'acted_on', 'dismissed') DEFAULT 'new' NOT NULL, acted_at TIMESTAMP, confidence_score VARCHAR(10), created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS trends (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, account_id INT NOT NULL, trend_type ENUM('topic', 'visual_style', 'hashtag', 'posting_time', 'caption_style', 'content_format') NOT NULL, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description TEXT, avg_engagement_rate VARCHAR(10), avg_reach VARCHAR(50), post_count INT DEFAULT 0, is_rising BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, trend_score VARCHAR(10), detected_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, period_start TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, period_end TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, related_post_ids JSON, related_hashtags JSON, updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL);
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4FiUfikgDQU4MHP.4fff9066d80d --database U34NkkLJbrpbDaDFLXHvpq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS performance_insights (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, campaign_id INT, account_id INT NOT NULL, insight_type ENUM('underperforming', 'overperforming', 'trending', 'negative_sentiment', 'engagement_drop', 'best_time', 'content_suggestion', 'hashtag_recommendation', 'audience_insight') NOT NULL, title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description TEXT NOT NULL, priority ENUM('low', 'medium', 'high', 'critical') DEFAULT 'medium' NOT NULL, recommendations JSON, related_metrics JSON, status ENUM('new', 'viewed', 'acted_on', 'dismissed') DEFAULT 'new' NOT NULL, acted_at TIMESTAMP, confidence_score VARCHAR(10), created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS trends (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, account_id INT NOT NULL, trend_type ENUM('topic', 'visual_style', 'hashtag', 'posting_time', 'caption_style', 'content_format') NOT NULL, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description TEXT, avg_engagement_rate VARCHAR(10), avg_reach VARCHAR(50), post_count INT DEFAULT 0, is_rising BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, trend_score VARCHAR(10), detected_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, period_start TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, period_end TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, related_post_ids JSON, related_hashtags JSON, updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL);
